rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space that incorporates elements of Bohemian design with natural textures.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living area merging seamlessly with the kitchen. Features comfortable seating and eclectic decor reflecting Bohemian style.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional open-plan kitchen integrated into the living space. Includes essential appliances and a breakfast bar, designed to optimize workflow and natural light.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A serene, landscaped courtyard that serves as an outdoor living area. Incorporates water features and greenery for a relaxing atmosphere.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated workspace with sound insulation and natural light to promote productivity. Designed within the duplex layout to ensure privacy yet maintain connectivity.
